name: Pony Realistic for Thisponydoesnotexist (PRT)
description:
This is a model used for fixing the ponies drawn by www.thisponydoesnotexist.net in img to img mode. For text to img mode the outcome is not very satisfactory so nvm the text to img mode.

For the img to img mode, use the deepbooru for the prompts and create some negative prompts, set the CFG at 7, denoise at 0.75, and just drop in the original picture generated by thisponydoesnotexist is enough.

meta.prompt: :d, blue_background, blue_sky, full_body, gradient, gradient_background, happy, multicolored_hair, open_mouth, pokemon_\(creature\), red_eyes, simple_background, sky, smile, solo, (rainbow dash), A pony who is looking up at the sky, cute, adorable, female, rendered, 8k quality, best resolution, masterpiece, wonderful render, round legs, adorable hooves, long hair, straight hair, distinct colors
meta.negativePrompt: eformed objects. weird objects, cracked, cracked objects, weird lighting, weird stars, weird moon, weird water, weird water ripples, weird tides, deformed beach, deformed birds, multiple sun, multiple moons, weird orientation tides, tilted, covered, ugly, deformed body, stacked, bad anatomy, bad proportions, blurry, cloned face, cropped, deformed, dehydrated, disfigured, extra limbs, face cut, head cut, low quality, low resolution, malformed limbs, mutation, noise, text, ugly, watermark, fat, short, weird, flat, multiple hands, multiple arms, multiple legs, multiple feet, deformed tides, nsfw, tits, boobs, naked, human, anime, G4 characters, curl hair, facing away

meta.prompt: 1girl, animal_ears, blue_eyes, closed_mouth, eyelashes, face, pink_hair, simple_background, smile, solo, fluttershy, drawing, 2d, masterpiece, A pony who is looking up at the sky, cute, adorable, female, rendered, 8k quality, best resolution, masterpiece, wonderful render, round legs, adorable hooves, long hair, straight hair, distinct colors
